backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profile management, AI-driven task generation based on user capabilities and habits, daily quest generation system, and task completion tracking with experience and level progression.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: user profile setup questionnaire, automatic daily quest generation, voice control integration for AI quests, and dashboard display of personalization status.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, and configuration files including dashboard, profile setup, AI personalization, quest management, voice control, and game state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with Solo Leveling-inspired dark theme using OKLCH color system, defining CSS custom properties for light and dark modes with blue/purple accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Life Leveling System application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient for data fetching, ThemeProvider for dark mode, and rendering Dashboard with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AchievementPanel: Achievement display component showing unlocked/locked achievements in a grid with trophy icons, unlock status badges, completion percentage, and visual distinction between achieved and locked items.
frontend/src/components/AIPersonalizatio: Card component displaying AI personalization metrics including difficulty tier badge, progress to next tier, completion rate, streak counter, and quest statistics from QuestLog data.
frontend/src/components/CharacterStats.t: Displays character statistics including level, XP progress bar, and four core stats (Strength, Intelligence, Discipline, Agility) with icons and visual styling using Card components.
frontend/src/components/DailyQuests.tsx: Manages daily quests display and completion, integrating both local game state and backend AI-generated quests with support for multiple task types (exercise, nutrition, mindfulness, hydration, sleep) and text-to-speech feedback.
frontend/src/components/DailyTaskList.ts: Provides UI for adding, completing, and deleting custom daily tasks with XP rewards, featuring a form input and task list with checkboxes and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/GoalTracker.tsx: Tracks long-term goals with progress bars, allowing users to add goals with target values, increment progress, and receive XP rewards upon completion.
frontend/src/components/HabitTracker.tsx: Manages habit tracking with streak counting, enabling users to add habits, mark them complete daily, and earn XP for maintaining streaks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main application layout with a sticky header showing the app title and logo, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Multi-step form component for setting up user health and fitness profile, including physical capabilities, health conditions, habits, and exercise preferences.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSummary.t: Displays a summary card of user's fitness profile including fitness level badge, health conditions, and preferred activities with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/SkillProgression: Component for managing skills with add/practice/delete functionality, progress tracking, level-up mechanics, and voice feedback integration.
frontend/src/components/TaskManager.tsx: Tabbed interface component that organizes and displays Daily Tasks, Habits, Skills, and Goals sections.
frontend/src/components/VoiceControl.tsx: Voice command interface with microphone button for starting/stopping voice recognition and displaying transcripts of spoken commands.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages Internet Identity authentication and creates/caches backend actor instances with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDifficultyProgress: Hook that calculates difficulty tier, completion rate, streak, and progress metrics based on quest log data.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Core game state management hook handling character stats, tasks, habits, skills, goals, quests, and achievements with localStorage persistence and XP/leveling mechanics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Custom hook that manages user profile data, checks profile completeness based on required fields (capabilities, habits, preferences), and provides update functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, quest logs, and tasks, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestGeneration.ts: Hook that monitors quest log freshness and determines if new daily quests need generation (after 24 hours or if empty), providing refetch capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Provides text-to-speech functionality using Web Speech API with specialized methods for announcing quest completions, difficulty increases, and quest lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecognition.t: Implements voice command recognition using Web Speech API to process commands for adding/completing tasks, habits, skills, and AI quests through natural language.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (colors, borders, spacing) supporting both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying character stats, tasks, quests, and achievements with profile setup flow, AI quest generation monitoring, and tab-based navigation.
frontend/src/types/game.ts: TypeScript type definitions for game entities including Character, DailyTask, Habit, Skill, Goal, Quest, and Achievement interfaces.
frontend/src/types/speech.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the Web Speech API, defining interfaces for SpeechRecognition, related events, results, and browser-specific implementations (including webkit prefix).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, glow shadows, accordion/pulse animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a Solo Leveling-inspired gamified life progression system with voice-activated task tracking, AI-powered personalized quest generation based on user physical capabilities, and XP/leveling mechanics.
